title: Discovering Innovation in Sports Technology
itunes:title: Discovering Innovation in Sports Technology
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch speak with Jenna Kurath, Head of the Comcast NBC Universal Sports Tech Accelerator and Vice President of Startup Partnerships. They discuss the exciting innovations driving the world of sports technology, and the potential partnerships and investment opportunities given to startups shaping the media landscape. All that and more on this weekend edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
